action.action-desc: Mr. Collins of New York (for himself, Mr. Farenthold, and Mr. Jones) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to ensure that new wind turbines located near certain military installations are ineligible for the renewable electricity production credit and the energy credit.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Protection of Military Airfields from Wind Turbine Encroachment Act.

section.header: New wind turbines located near certain military installations

subsection.text: Paragraph (1) of section 45(d) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking Such term and all that follows through the period and inserting the following:

subparagraph.text: any facility with respect to which any qualified small wind energy property expenditure (as defined in subsection (d)(4) of section 25D) is taken into account in determining the credit under such section, or

any facility which is originally placed in service after the date of the enactment of the Protection of Military Airfields from Wind Turbine Encroachment Act and is located within a 50-mile radius of—

clause.text: an airfield or airbase under the jurisdiction of a military department which is in active use, or
an air traffic control radar site, weather radar site, or aircraft navigation aid which is—

subclause.text: owned or operated by the Department of Defense, and
a permanent land-based structure at a fixed location.

subsection.text: Paragraph (4) of section 48(c) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended—

paragraph.text: by redesignating subparagraph (C) as subparagraph (D), and
by inserting after subparagraph (B) the following:

subparagraph.text: The term qualified small wind energy property shall not include any property which is originally placed in service after the date of the enactment of the Protection of Military Airfields from Wind Turbine Encroachment Act and is located within a 50-mile radius of any property described in clause (i) or (ii) of section 45(d)(1)(B).

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to property placed in service after the date of the enactment of this Act.
